definitions.definition: To wash (something) quickly using water and no soap .
examples: You'd better rinse that stain before putting the shirt in the washing machine.

definitions.definition: To remove soap from (something) using water .
examples: Rinse the dishes after you wash them.

definitions.definition: To swish (a liquid) around the inside of something.
To thoroughly defeat in an argument, fight or other competition.

main_definition: ( transitive ) To wash (something) quickly using water and no soap .
secondary_definitions: ( transitive ) To remove soap from (something) using water .
( transitive ) To swish (a liquid) around the inside of something.
( UK , slang ) To thoroughly defeat in an argument, fight or other competition.
